message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly beneficial to you, and I've priced it fairly considering its value.
Alice,  $20,000 is way above my budget for this product. I'm really interested, but I can only offer $12,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this is a fair compromise.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $17,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $12,000.  This is my final offer, let me know if you're willing to accept it.
